conclusion: Analyze the flow of liquid through the baffles to predict which container (E or F) it will flow into.
Identify the points where the liquid will flow based on the image: A, B, C, D, E, and F.
The liquid will flow from point A to point B, then from B to C, and so on, through the baffles.
Determine the path of the liquid: starting from A, then B, C, D, and finally E.
Predict which container (E or F) the liquid will flow into: it will flow into container F.
Verify the flow pattern by checking the sequence of points and the direction of the liquid flow.
